develop.text: Cordova, AngularJS, Java, CSS, UX…. We love technology and we’re a little obsessed with it. We work in a flexible and easy way and we are always changing the way in which SMEs in the world create their mobile application. We learn something new every day.
develop.title: Dept. of Develop

marketing.text: Our goal is to bring this project to every corner in the world. Our every day life is dedicated to data and analysis. Always thinking of how to sell more in less time. Every time we get a new client, we blow a horn in the office to celebrate.
marketing.title: Dept. of Marketing

support.img: Belén is calling with his best smile
support.text: Our main objective is to make our costumers happy. Every day, we talk to hundreds of clients from more than 65 countries. We are very approachable and we always have a smile on our faces. We love to help, so that you have a pleasant and beneficial experience.
support.title: Dept. of Support

company._keywords: create app, how to create your app, create app android, create app iphone, create application, create online app, crear mobile app
company._meta_description: Do apps yourself, for your business. It is easy, without coding and quick, just in few minutes!

intro.description: Upplication is an useful, complete, and totally personalized service . It is also to help small and medium enterprises find a new communication channel that provides solutions, ideas and tools in which they will be able to achieve what we truly believe is important: building costumer loyalty, increase sales, and be different from the competitors.

step1.description: We launch Upplication for all kind of small business. Anyone can make his own app easily without programming knowledge.

step2.description: We closed our first round of investments by European Business Angels (investors), with 277.000€. This investment is what helped us internationalize ourselves , leading us to Latinoamerica.

step3.description: We were selected from a pot of 660 startups from all over Spain by Wayra (Telefónica) to his Startups Raising Program.

step4.description: We have reached a trade integration agreement with Vodafone completing its plan of supporting and assisting SMEs grow.

step5.description: We already had clients in 65 different countries , reaching one of our goals: International growthl.

step6.description: We closed our second round of investments with 1.1 million euros ; mostly led by Corporation Global , - who come form a Spanish origin - with Business Angels).

step7.description: We have reached a trade integration agreement with Telefonica Spain , in which we will keep receiving support from, teaching us their knowledge and experience.

offer._keywords: crear app, como crear tu app, crear app android, crear app iphone, crear aplicacion, crear app online, crear app movil
offer._meta_description: Trainee frontender or backender developer job offer in Upplication: the online app creator for you and your business.
offer._meta_title: Trainee developer job offer - Upplication: app creator
introduction: In Upplication we’re a team that has an unquenchable thirst for learning, and thankfully we have unlimited information. Every idea is thoroughly revised and discussed between the team, so that every decision we make will be of the highest quality.
We always want to improve our ideas and because of that we are looking for a new intern to join our developing team, who will help us develop our dashboard and internal CRM.

We want to offer practice, and the opportunity to will learn and be able to enter the labor market. We don’t believe in practice in which even though the employee shows their worth, they don’t have the opportunity to enter and be part of the company. That’s not accepted anymore! If the person is well hearted, and joins a developing company, there will be a problem if they don’t make them part of the team.
offer.lifestyle: Si quieres ganarte la vida como desarrollador y te gustan las tecnologías móviles, nos gustaría que nos conociéramos y habláramos sobre el proyecto y nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. Si vemos que todo cuadra, haremos todo lo posible para que estés en nuestro equipo.

technologies.intro: For this internship, we are looking for a developer bears experience with the following programs:
list: Java
SQL
Html and Javascript
Familiarity with any MVC framework, e.g., Spring MVC
Familiarity with Java EE 6
technologies.note: We are not looking for an expert, that is why these internships exist, and that is why we are looking for someone with incentive and motivation. We are looking someone that wants to work for something more than just a salary. Someone that wants to do something big.

list: Practice of 3 or 4 months with the possibility to be a permanent part of the team.
Flexible hours
Not just one simple tutor, a whole team that is always at your disposal for help
To experience, live, the development of a rising project, where your code will be used by thousands of people.
A comfortable and ample workplace with a good team, and two 22’’ monitors so that you can work with delight.
A room to relax in, with puffs and couches, a coffee machine, fridge, microwave, located on Príncipe Pío… Honestly, Wayra (our incubators) are pretty cool.
A 100€ bill, so that it doesn’t cost you anything to join Upplication.

offer.wewanttomeetyou: Send us an email so we can get to know you, at javier.arnaiz@upplication.com Please attach your CV and a short paragraph about you, your work and how you can improve Upplication. We promise we will email you back!

offer_marketing._keywords: crear app, como crear tu app, crear app android, crear app iphone, crear aplicacion, crear app online, crear app movil
offer_marketing._meta_description: Trainee marketing and salesman job offer in Upplication: the online app creator. It is easy, without coding and quick, just in few minutes!
offer_marketing._meta_title: Trainee marketing job offer - Upplication: app creator
introduction: Upplication es una herramienta que permite a cualquier pyme crearse una app en pocos pasos, sin necesidad de conocimientos técnicos ni llamar a nadie, y por un precio que se adapta a su capacidad de inversión (desde 5€/mes).
Actualmente tenemos presencia en 46 países y hemos creado más de 10.000 apps en los 10 meses que llevamos en el mercado.
offer_marketing.lifestyle: Si quieres ganarte la vida como desarrollador y te gustan las tecnologías móviles, nos gustaría que nos conociéramos y habláramos sobre el proyecto y nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. Si vemos que todo cuadra, haremos todo lo posible para que estés en nuestro equipo.

technologies.intro: We are looking for an intern that will join our Marketing department, and that fulfills the following requirements:
list: We are looking for someone with a degree - or someone near the end of one – that is passionate for marketing.
Knows how to use editing and designing tools.
Adept writing skills.
Is interested in Digital Marketing and E-commerce.
Preferably someone with experience with journalism and content writing.
Someone that is proactive, with an initiative, and wants to be involved with the company and its projects.
Organized (detail oriented).
Hard working and ambitious – we are looking for a young professional that will take ownership of the Upplication project.
technologies.note: We are not looking for an expert, that is why these internships exist, and that is why we are looking for someone with incentive and motivation. We are looking someone that wants to work for something more than just a salary. Someone that wants to do something big.

weoffer.intro: To start, your job will be:
list: Help the clients with the formulation of the app.
Help with the development of new marketing projects.
Support other departments (Social Media, E-commerce, etc.).
Since the intern is involved with the marketing department, depending on the results, there could be an added bonus in salary.

offer_marketing.wewanttomeetyou: Send us an email so we can get to know you, at info@upplication.com Please attach your CV and a short paragraph about you, your work and how you can improve Upplication. We promise we will email you back!
